zh_CN.DialogText: 我这没什么东西，只能给你一些

en_US.DialogText: I have nothing here. I can only give you some

zh_CN.DialogText: 谢谢，谢谢，真的，你是这个孩子的救命恩人。

en_US.DialogText: Thank you, thank you, really, you are the Savior of this child.

zh_CN.DialogText: 所以，你现在能告诉我为什么对他这么执着了吗？

en_US.DialogText: So, can you tell me why you are so persistent to him now?

zh_CN.DialogText: 好吧...他是我的...爱人的孩子。

en_US.DialogText: ok, He is my Husband's children.

zh_CN.DialogText: 就在爆炸发生后不久，他被高处掉下来的碎片砸死了...而我还活着

en_US.DialogText: Shortly after the explosion, he was killed by falling debris And I'm still alive

zh_CN.DialogText: 我觉得对不起他...因为孩子...哦不，不对，孩子他...

en_US.DialogText: I feel sorry for him ...Because the child ...Oh, no, no,... child he is...

zh_CN.DialogText: 是因为你觉得孩子可能并不是你爱人的？

en_US.DialogText: Is it because you think the child may not belong to your Husband?

zh_CN.DialogText: 她哭着跑开了，看着在昏暗的地下消失的她，心里总觉得.....

en_US.DialogText: She ran away crying. Looking at her disappearing in the dark underground, she always felt

zh_CN.DialogText: 算了，总归是帮了一个人....
